'''[[2015-2016 SB32 (USA CA)|SB 32]] California Global Warming Solutions Act of 2006: emissions limit.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 25, nays 13. 
:*Sebastian voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading By RIDLEY-THOMAS).
:*Sebastian voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Motion to Reconsider).
:*Sebastian voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading Amend By GARCIA, E. Set #1).
:*Sebastian voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading By GARCIA, E.).

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 45, nays 30.

Final legislative action 2016-08-31 passed yeas 54, nays 25.
